abstract: A half-dozen members of the Thomson Reuters  research department are moving to Standard & Poor’s to form a new department to produce market research for hedge funds and other Wall Street players, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: A half-dozen members of the Thomson Reuters  research department are moving to Standard & Poor’s to form a new department to produce market research for hedge funds and other Wall Street players, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Thomson Reuters Said to Team With S&P for Hedge Fund Research
